title: ele manave
sahitya:
ele manave hari dhyAna mADu


caraNam 1    ele jihve kELu kEshavana guNagaLa nudisu ele manave muravairiyanghrigaLa bhajisu 
elele karagaLira shrIdharana sEveya mADi ele karNagaLira acyutana kathe kELi
    caraNam 2    ele nEtragaLira shrI krSNa mUrtiya nODi ele pAdagaLira haruyAtreyana mADi 
ele nAsikave mukundana caraNa karpisida tulasi parimaLavanAghrANisanudinavu
    caraNam 3    ele shirave nI kELadhOkSajana siri cAraNa jalaruhadoLaLiyante biDade OLADu 
ele tanuve nInu shrI purandara viTTalana sale bhakuta janara sangatiyalli bALu
